channel.title: Best way to kill barrows at a low level?
channel.description:
How do some of you kill barrows as low levels? Lots of food? Range? Magic?
Note: this is directed at xIce since hes barrow pro but anyone else can input maybe someone else has same question so i made topic instead of pming him

item.title: Best way to kill barrows at a low level?
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

big bones = 100-200 gp each… altar runs. Dragon bones ofc faster but more expensive.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JzN5ymC1VY&list=UUkGvml-pkOkpNzpRn62M3vg&index=2[/youtube]

Free gilded altar

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to kill barrows at a low level?
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:9, topic:507045”][quote author=latifundio link=topic=625270.msg4256977#msg4256977 date=1362936199]

What’s the fastest and cheapest way to 43 prayer?

quests then ghasts
[/quote]Ghasts? Why’s that[/quote]
30 pray xp each, filling pouches is super easy(on some spots :D), easy to kill(47 hp), and you don’t have the hassle of picking up bones and burying them.

Read full topic

item.source: Best way to kill barrows at a low level?

item.title: Best way to kill barrows at a low level?
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

HcoJustin:

Looks like ice is just using water blast with melee and range. 43 prayer helps a ton

Pretty much this. I have somewhat good melee stats so I melee Karil but I always see lower lvls using mage on it. If you don’t have a good range level (50+) then I would skip Ahrim. If you have a meleer as a tunnel, you can try and make it spawn in the room where your ladder is and safespot it using the ladder.

I’ve only ever seen people using fire bolt or higher so I would recommend using fire bolt or higher.

Read full topic
